video.title: How I Met Your Mother
video.synopsis: Ted's epic search for his soul mate is told largely through flashbacks, as an adult Ted recounts to his kids how he met their mother.

episodes.synopsis: In 2029, Ted tells his children the story of how he met their mother, beginning back in 2005 with Marshall and Lily's engagement.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ted throws a party in hopes of seeing Robin again, but when she doesn't show up, he throws another party ... and another.
episodes.title: Purple Giraffe

episodes.synopsis: Barney's plan to meet girls at the airport backfires as he and Ted are picked up by airport security. Meanwhile, Lily gets jealous of Robin.
episodes.title: The Sweet Taste of Liberty

episodes.synopsis: Ted reconnects with an old flame and soon remembers why he dumped her in the first place. Barney pays Robin to say outrageous things on the air.
episodes.title: Return of the Shirt

episodes.synopsis: Robin, Ted and Barney go to a hot new club, leaving the engaged Marshall and Lily to a more adult, albeit boring, evening of wine tasting.
episodes.title: Okay Awesome

episodes.synopsis: Halloween high jinks are afoot as Ted makes his annual trek to the same lame party in search of a girl he met there years ago.
episodes.title: The Slutty Pumpkin

episodes.synopsis: When Ted signs up with a matchmaking service, he learns that love is not a science. Marshall and Lily confront a creature living in the apartment.
episodes.title: Matchmaker

episodes.synopsis: Lily moves in with Marshall and Ted, and when Ted suspects that he's being edged out of the apartment, he and Marshall decide to settle it like men.
episodes.title: The Duel

episodes.synopsis: Thanksgiving with Marshall's family is stressful because Lily thinks she may be pregnant. Robin, Barney and Ted spend the holiday volunteering.
episodes.title: Belly Full of Turkey

episodes.synopsis: After an alcohol-induced blackout, Ted awakens to find a strange woman -- and a pineapple -- in his bed.
episodes.title: The Pineapple Incident

episodes.synopsis: New Year's Eve is a wild ride as Ted rents a limo for a night of party-hopping with the gang.
episodes.title: The Limo

episodes.synopsis: Ted's romantic hopes are dashed when he invites Robin to a fancy wedding, only to discover that the bride-to-be won't allow him to bring a date.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Robin is emotionally torn when Ted meets an exciting new woman, Victoria, at the wedding. Afterward, though, he doesn't know how to contact her.
episodes.title: Drumroll, Please

episodes.synopsis: Hiding in the bathroom, Marshall and Lily wait for Ted and Victoria to consummate their relationship, and Barney gets the wrong idea from Robin.
episodes.title: Zip, Zip, Zip

episodes.synopsis: Marshall's game night leads to some startling and very embarrassing revelations.
episodes.title: Game Night

episodes.synopsis: Just as Ted and Victoria's relationship is beginning to flourish, she's offered a scholarship to a culinary institute in Germany.
episodes.title: Cupcake

episodes.synopsis: With Victoria in Germany, Ted faces the pitfalls of long-distance relationships. Marshall has trouble fitting in at Barney's company.
episodes.title: Life Among the Gorillas

episodes.synopsis: With Victoria on his mind, Ted has conflicted feelings when Robin invites him over for a late-night rendezvous.
episodes.title: Nothing Good Happens After 2 A.M.

episodes.synopsis: Ted needs a date to take to Robin's awards banquet, so Barney hooks him up with Mary, who may be a call girl.
episodes.title: Mary the Paralegal

episodes.synopsis: With her wedding day fast approaching, Lily, along with Barney and Robin, crashes a high school prom to scope out a potential band for the reception.
episodes.title: Best Prom Ever

episodes.synopsis: Ted is excited when a matchmaking service claims to have found his soul mate, but he postpones his date to help Lily, who has a surprising revelation.
episodes.title: Milk

episodes.synopsis: Ted tries to stop Robin from going on a trip with her co-anchor, Sandy. Marshall gets upset when he finds out about Lily's fellowship interview.
episodes.title: Come On

episodes.synopsis: Lily goes to San Francisco to enroll in an art program, leaving Ted, Barney and Robin to deal with the fallout of her breakup with Marshall.
episodes.title: Where Were We?

episodes.synopsis: Lily returns from San Francisco just as Marshall is finally recovering from their breakup.
episodes.title: The Scorpion and the Toad

episodes.synopsis: Ted's parents are visiting for the weekend, and a stunning family secret is revealed during brunch.
episodes.title: Brunch

episodes.synopsis: After Ted and Robin have a fight, Barney tries to show Ted that his job as an architect is a great way to pick up women.
episodes.title: Ted Mosby: Architect

episodes.synopsis: Lily moves in with Barney to escape her rat-infested apartment, and Marshall enjoys fun "couple activities" with a male law-school buddy.
episodes.title: World's Greatest Couple

episodes.synopsis: Barney seduces Marshall's law professor in hopes of getting her to grade more leniently. Lily takes a job at Ted's office.
episodes.title: Aldrin Justice

episodes.synopsis: Ted and Barney try to convince Marshall that his new girlfriend is crazy. Barney gets a new nickname.
episodes.title: Swarley

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily drag the gang to Atlantic City to elope.
episodes.title: Atlantic City

episodes.synopsis: Robin's aversion to malls piques Ted's interest as to what secret she is hiding.
episodes.title: Slap Bet

episodes.synopsis: Barney's gay brother arrives for a visit as Barney is struggling with the fact that his closest friends have settled into relationships.
episodes.title: Single Stamina

episodes.synopsis: Harsh words exchanged between Ted and Lily nearly ruin Christmas.
episodes.title: How Lily Stole Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Robin tries to keep her teenage sister from having sex, which prompts everyone to recall their own first sexual experiences.
episodes.title: First Time in New York

episodes.synopsis: Ted struggles to fire an employee. The gang torments Marshall after discovering a nude portrait of him.
episodes.title: Columns

episodes.synopsis: A funeral keeps the gang from watching the Super Bowl live, and they make a pact not to find out the final score until they can watch it the next day.
episodes.title: Monday Night Football

episodes.synopsis: A string of bad luck ensues when Ted picks up a penny on the subway; it culminates with his missing a job interview -- and possibly his destiny.
episodes.title: Lucky Penny

episodes.synopsis: Ted and Robin get hung up on the items each of them has kept from previous relationships. Lily forces the gang to see her in a play.
episodes.title: Stuff

episodes.synopsis: When Marshall's Fiero gives out just short of reaching 200,000 miles, the gang recounts their memories of the car, marking the end of an era.
episodes.title: Arrivederci, Fiero

episodes.synopsis: Barney goes to extraordinary lengths to sabotage Ted and Robin's relationship as the two prepare to move in together.
episodes.title: Moving Day

episodes.synopsis: After ruining Marshall's bachelor party, Barney is nearly uninvited to Marshall and Lily's wedding, until Lily speaks up for him.
episodes.title: Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: Thinking Bob Barker may be his dad, Barney trains for an appearance on "The Price Is Right." Marshall and Lily try sleeping apart before the wedding.
episodes.title: Showdown

episodes.synopsis: When Marshall and Lily's plans for their dream wedding go awry, Ted and the gang step in to save the day.
episodes.title: Something Borrowed

episodes.synopsis: At Marshall and Lily's wedding reception, Barney finds out that Ted and Robin have a secret they have been hiding for weeks.
episodes.title: Something Blue

episodes.synopsis: When Robin shows up with an Adonis by her side, Ted decides to hit the town with Barney, and his performance is legen- ... wait for it ... -dary.
episodes.title: Wait for It

episodes.synopsis: After seeing girls get weak in the knees over Robin's man, Gael, Barney and Ted decide to pose as out-of-towners in order to meet chicks.
episodes.title: We're Not From Here

episodes.synopsis: When two women are both attracted to Ted, they take the party to his place, where the gang helps Ted realize bad luck doesn't always come in threes.
episodes.title: Third Wheel

episodes.synopsis: When "kid unfriendly" Robin forms a bond with the son of the guy she is dating, she decides it is too serious and must let the little guy down.
episodes.title: Little Boys

episodes.synopsis: Ted's new girl becomes jealous that the story of how he and his pals met is better than the story of how she and Ted met.
episodes.title: How I Met Everyone Else

episodes.synopsis: When a corporate law firm courts Marshall, he's forced to let go of his dream of saving the earth in favor of the almighty dollar.
episodes.title: I'm Not That Guy

episodes.synopsis: When Lily and Marshall decide to buy an apartment, Marshall discovers Lily's dirty little financial secret when they apply for a loan.
episodes.title: Dowisetrepla

episodes.synopsis: When Ted thinks he has met a wonderful girl, the gang can't help but point out a flaw, eventually leading to a heated exchange among the group.
episodes.title: Spoiler Alert

episodes.synopsis: As Lily and Marshall host their first Thanksgiving as a married couple, Barney is tortured by the tick-tock of the slap bet countdown clock.
episodes.title: Slapsgiving

episodes.synopsis: When Barney loses his mojo, he attends the Victoria's Secret Fall Fashion Show after-party to get himself back on track.
episodes.title: The Yips

episodes.synopsis: When the gang learns Ted is taking his doctor on a date, they try to convince him it isn't a good idea to date someone you see on a regular basis.
episodes.title: The Platinum Rule

episodes.synopsis: When Ted takes a page from Barney's book and lives like there's no tomorrow, he gets a post-St. Patty's Day reality check from Marshall.
episodes.title: No Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: Ted pursues his dermatologist, Stella. While Stella turns down his repeated efforts for a date, her receptionist, Abby, becomes smitten with Ted.
episodes.title: Ten Sessions

episodes.synopsis: When Barney's love life is sabotaged by a mystery woman, he turns to tournament bracketology to narrow down who has the most cause to hate his guts.
episodes.title: The Bracket

episodes.synopsis: After Marshall is verbally emasculated by his boss, he struggles with the fact that taking a job with a corporate law firm may have been a mistake.
episodes.title: The Chain of Screaming

episodes.synopsis: When Robin rekindles things with an old flame, he crushes her again, but Barney, in his own inimitable style, helps her realize that she is awesome.
episodes.title: Sandcastles in the Sand

episodes.synopsis: When a guilt-ridden Barney breaks the "bro code," he struggles with the ramifications of his misstep.
episodes.title: The Goat

episodes.synopsis: When Ted tells the gang Stella's intimate secret, he must face the consequences of breaking her trust.
episodes.title: Rebound Bro

episodes.synopsis: When Barney and Abby realize that they share a mutual hatred of Ted, the "couple" goes to the bar to flaunt their new relationship in Ted's face.
episodes.title: Everything Must Go

episodes.synopsis: When Ted is in an accident, he reevaluates his life and relationship with Stella.
episodes.title: Miracles

episodes.synopsis: Stella responds to Ted's proposal. Meanwhile, Barney realizes that he's in love with Robin.
episodes.title: Do I Know You?

episodes.synopsis: While on a quest to find the restaurant where he had his first Big Apple burger, Marshall bumps into television personality Regis Philbin.
episodes.title: The Best Burger in New York

episodes.synopsis: Ted is blindsided by the news that Stella expects him to move to New Jersey once they're married.
episodes.title: I Heart NJ

episodes.synopsis: Ted insists that his friends go through with the intervention they had previously planned for his engagement to Stella.
episodes.title: Intervention

episodes.synopsis: After Stella and Ted decide to get married in three days, the presence of their exes destroys what was to be the happiest day of the couple's life.
episodes.title: Shelter Island

episodes.synopsis: The gang discusses how they would handle encounters with people they'd rather not see ever again.
episodes.title: Happily Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Before making a life-altering decision, Lily seeks advice from Ted and Robin.
episodes.title: Not a Father's Day

episodes.synopsis: Robin starts hanging out with a group of single party girls.
episodes.title: Woooo!

episodes.synopsis: The gang discovers a new way to score after Ted witnesses a tactic used by Robin's date.
episodes.title: The Naked Man

episodes.synopsis: To change their friends' perceptions of them, Ted and Barney pick a fight with a group of guys at MacLaren's.
episodes.title: The Fight

episodes.synopsis: Ted tries to keep his younger sister away from Barney when she comes to visit New York City.
episodes.title: Little Minnesota

episodes.synopsis: Robin and Ted discover that they get along better as roommates if they're "friends with benefits."
episodes.title: Benefits

episodes.synopsis: The gang refuses to let a blizzard ruin their rituals of having fun.
episodes.title: Three Days of Snow

episodes.synopsis: The gang tries to help Robin find a job so that she won't be deported.
episodes.title: Possimpible

episodes.synopsis: After noticing Barney's bizarre behavior, the gang suspects that he has a secret girlfriend.
episodes.title: The Stinsons

episodes.synopsis: Lily and Marshall are less than thrilled when Ted reunites with his pompous ex-girlfriend from college.
episodes.title: Sorry, Bro

episodes.synopsis: Ted is shocked to learn that Lily is responsible for his breakup with Karen -- and for ruining his relationships with many of his former girlfriends.
episodes.title: The Front Porch

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Barney lie to protect Ted after Goliath National Bank cancels plans to build the headquarters he was hired to design.
episodes.title: Old King Clancy

episodes.synopsis: When Ted makes a list of things he says the gang is too old to do, Barney tries to complete everything on the list in one day.
episodes.title: Murtaugh

episodes.synopsis: Ted starts an architecture firm in his apartment and hires an intern to help get the company up and running.
episodes.title: Mosbius Designs

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Barney play a joke on Ted by pretending to be a girl that he's having a "text" relationship with.
episodes.title: The Three Days Rule

episodes.synopsis: Ted learns how a chance meeting with someone from the past can push a person toward his or her destiny. Meanwhile, Barney celebrates a milestone.
episodes.title: Right Place Right Time

episodes.synopsis: Ted's ex walks back into his life -- along with her new fiancé.
episodes.title: As Fast as She Can

episodes.synopsis: As Ted approaches his 31st birthday, he comes to realize that he needs to explore other career options.
episodes.title: The Leap

episodes.synopsis: The gang finds out that Robin and Barney are carrying on a secret romance.
episodes.title: Definitions

episodes.synopsis: While on a blind date, Ted discovers he had been fixed up with the same girl seven years earlier.
episodes.title: Double Date

episodes.synopsis: Ted puts his knowledge about Robin to good use when he teaches Barney a class on how to date Robin.
episodes.title: Robin 101

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily try too hard to impress Barney and Robin on their first double date.
episodes.title: The Sexless Innkeeper

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries to convince Robin to become an American citizen, and Ted and Marshall's road trip goes off course when Lily decides to tag along.
episodes.title: Duel Citizenship

episodes.synopsis: When Marshall receives relationship advice from Barney, he and Lily have a huge fight.
episodes.title: Bagpipes

episodes.synopsis: When the gang realizes Barney and Robin are miserable together, Ted and Marshall request Lily's help in breaking them up.
episodes.title: The Rough Patch

episodes.synopsis: After breaking up with Robin, Barney jumps back into the dating scene with the classic moves from his "playbook.
episodes.title: The Playbook

episodes.synopsis: Marshall bequeaths a slap bet to Ted and Robin, and Lily's estranged father makes a surprise visit.
episodes.title: Slapsgiving 2: Revenge of the Slap

episodes.synopsis: Ted finally finds an opportunity to date the ideal girl next door.
episodes.title: The Window

episodes.synopsis: The gang attempts to quit smoking while Robin "butts" heads with her new jaded co-worker.
episodes.title: Last Cigarette Ever

episodes.synopsis: While Barney must choose between bedding the bar's hot bartender or his beloved suits, Ted gets one step closer to meeting his future wife.
episodes.title: Girls Vs. Suits

episodes.synopsis: Marshall tries to prove to Lily that his attractive female colleague planted a kiss on him.
episodes.title: Jenkins

episodes.synopsis: Barney attempts to score "the perfect week" by hooking up with seven girls in seven days.
episodes.title: Perfect Week

episodes.synopsis: With one week until Valentine's Day, Ted leaves it up to Marshall and Lily to find him a date.
episodes.title: Rabbit or Duck

episodes.synopsis: After the gang convinces Ted that he is being "hooked" by a girl, they reflect on their own similar relationships.
episodes.title: Hooked

episodes.synopsis: Robin concocts a plan to get back at Barney for his insensitivity during their breakup.
episodes.title: Of Course

episodes.synopsis: Ted ruins Lily's birthday by bringing a date.
episodes.title: Say Cheese

episodes.synopsis: After Marshall gets mugged, he comes up with an elaborate story about the mugging so Lily will feel safe again.
episodes.title: Zoo or False

episodes.synopsis: After witnessing his mother's overly affectionate relationship with her fiancé, Ted questions how far behind in his own life he is.
episodes.title: Home Wreckers

episodes.synopsis: Ted and Barney fight over their love for Robin.
episodes.title: Twin Beds

episodes.synopsis: Ted, Marshall, Lily and Barney crash a highfalutin party where Ted gets to show off his pretentious side.
episodes.title: Robots Vs. Wrestlers

episodes.synopsis: Ted takes a date to see a movie, The Wedding Bride, and realizes that it's loosely based on his own relationship with an ex.
episodes.title: The Wedding Bride

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily put fate to the test when deciding whether they are ready to have a baby.
episodes.title: Doppelgangers

episodes.synopsis: Ted runs into an old flame with whom things didn't end well.
episodes.title: Big Days

episodes.synopsis: As Barney helps his mother pack up his childhood home, he learns the truth about his father.
episodes.title: Cleaning House

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries his best seduction moves on Ted to try and convince him to take a job.
episodes.title: Unfinished

episodes.synopsis: The gang races to see who can arrive at a downtown restaurant the fastest.
episodes.title: Subway Wars

episodes.synopsis: Ted falls for a girl who is passionate about saving a landmark building that is being torn down to make room for his new dream project.
episodes.title: Architect of Destruction

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily separately read up on how to try and control the gender of their yet-to-be conceived baby.
episodes.title: Baby Talk

episodes.synopsis: Ted loses control of his students after Zoey enrolls in his class.
episodes.title: Canning Randy

episodes.synopsis: The gang attends a fundraiser at the Natural History Museum, where Ted runs into his archenemy and her husband, the Captain.
episodes.title: Natural History

episodes.synopsis: The gang encourages Robin to reunite with Jessica Glitter, her former best friend and co-star from her days performing on a Canadian kids show.
episodes.title: Glitter

episodes.synopsis: After the gang spends a night with a jinxed college friend, Ted's plans to put on a Thanksgiving feast are ruined, so he spends the holiday with Zoey.
episodes.title: Blitzgiving

episodes.synopsis: When Ted begins to question his relationship with Zoey, he befriends her husband.
episodes.title: The Mermaid Theory

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily receive surprising news that prompts the gang to reexamine their lives.
episodes.title: False Positive

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily overreact after seeing a specialist who can help them conceive a baby.
episodes.title: Bad News

episodes.synopsis: The gang vows to do whatever it takes to help Marshall get through a difficult time.
episodes.title: Last Words

episodes.synopsis: Ted realizes that he has feelings for Zoey. Meanwhile, Barney makes a move on Zoey's cousin.
episodes.title: Oh Honey

episodes.synopsis: The gang scrambles to make plans for Valentine's Day so that they don't have to spend it alone.
episodes.title: Desperation Day

episodes.synopsis: Marshall becomes obsessed with saving the environment. Elsewhere, Ted runs into Zoey's ex-husband.
episodes.title: Garbage Island

episodes.synopsis: Barney is confused by the feelings he has for Nora.
episodes.title: A Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: Barney finally meets his father.
episodes.title: Legendaddy

episodes.synopsis: Marshall quits his job to volunteer with an environmental organization.
episodes.title: The Exploding Meatball Sub

episodes.synopsis: Barney attempts to bond with his father.
episodes.title: Hopeless

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Barney argue about the destruction of the Arcadian Hotel.
episodes.title: The Perfect Cocktail

episodes.synopsis: Ted makes an important decision that ultimately affects his relationship with Zoey.
episodes.title: Landmarks

episodes.synopsis: Ted is called in to perform best man duties at an important wedding. Meanwhile, Robin and Barney bond as they intervene in Ted's relationship.
episodes.title: Challenge Accepted

episodes.synopsis: Barney and Ted reminisce about Ted's old friend's wedding, including Marshall's impromptu toast.
episodes.title: The Best Man

episodes.synopsis: Marshall receives the job offer of his dreams, but worries that videos he made in the past will resurface during the standard background check.
episodes.title: The Naked Truth

episodes.synopsis: Ted reconnects with an old flame, and Lily, Marshall and Barney make a bet that could result in Barney wearing Marshall's ducky tie.
episodes.title: Ducky Tie

episodes.synopsis: Robin begins court-mandated therapy sessions after assaulting a girl.
episodes.title: The Stinson Missile Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Marshall is surprised by his boss's settlement with a million dollar company.
episodes.title: Field Trip

episodes.synopsis: The gang interferes when Ted attempts to go on a date without researching the girl on the internet first.
episodes.title: Mystery vs. History

episodes.synopsis: Everyone realizes that their significant other reminds them of one of their parents.
episodes.title: Noretta

episodes.synopsis: Ted finally meets his mystery girl in the Slutty Pumpkin costume. Katie Holmes guest stars as Naomi, the Slutty Pumpkin.
episodes.title: The Slutty Pumpkin Returns

episodes.synopsis: While the gang reminisces about Hurricane Irene, Barney tries to cut a deal with Marshall and Lily to get out of wearing the ducky tie.
episodes.title: Disaster Averted

episodes.synopsis: Robin and Barney hide a secret from their significant others.
episodes.title: Tick Tick Tick

episodes.synopsis: Ted and Barney consider making a life-changing decision together.
episodes.title: The Rebound Girl

episodes.synopsis: Robin receives shocking news and hides it from the gang.
episodes.title: Symphony of Illumination

episodes.synopsis: Marshall visits his father's grave to carry on their tailgating tradition and tell him about New Year's Eve.
episodes.title: Tailgate

episodes.synopsis: On the 150th episode of How I Met Your Mother, Lily's overbearing father refuses to move out of their house in the suburbs.
episodes.title: 46 Minutes

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Lily's housewarming party goes awry.
episodes.title: The Burning Beekeeper

episodes.synopsis: Marshall, Lily, Robin and Kevin celebrate Valentine's Day with a weekend getaway.
episodes.title: The Drunk Train

episodes.synopsis: Ted confesses his feelings to Robin, and Barney finds something personal of Marshall and Lily's.
episodes.title: No Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries to convince Quinn to date him after realizing he has feelings for her.
episodes.title: Karma

episodes.synopsis: Barney reveals his plans to move in with Quinn, leaving Ted and Robin fighting over subletting her apartment.
episodes.title: The Broath

episodes.synopsis: Marshall, Barney and Ted envision what their lives will be like in another three years.
episodes.title: Trilogy Time

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries to lure Ted into making every night "legendary."
episodes.title: Now We're Even

episodes.synopsis: Marshall freaks out when he realizes the baby is coming soon.
episodes.title: Good Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Marshall and Barney desperately try to get back to New York when Lily goes into labor.
episodes.title: The Magician's Code Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On Barney's wedding day, the gang reminisces about when they encouraged Ted to chase after the one that got away.
episodes.title: The Magician's Code Part 2

episodes.synopsis: On Robin's wedding day, Ted recounts the time he insisted on leaving Victoria's jilted fiancé a note before they drove off into the sunset together.
episodes.title: Farhampton

episodes.synopsis: When Barney designs an extensive prenup, the guys take note and propose their own relationship amendments to their significant others.
episodes.title: The Pre-Nup

episodes.synopsis: When Lily and Marshall have trouble finding a nanny, they learn it's because of an elaborate scheme Barney came up with to meet girls.
episodes.title: Nannies

episodes.synopsis: When Lily and Marshall can't decide on godparents for Marvin, they put the gang to the test to see who would make the best one.
episodes.title: Who Wants to Be a Godparent?

episodes.synopsis: As the season of breakups continues, Ted and Victoria must choose the next step in their long and complicated relationship.
episodes.title: The Autumn of Break-Ups

episodes.synopsis: When Robin is hesitant to break up with Nick, Barney takes matters into his own hands. Meanwhile, Lily and Marshall are desperate for private time.
episodes.title: Splitsville

episodes.synopsis: Marshall recommends his old law school classmate Brad for a job at his firm, but the interview goes awry, leaving Marshall to do damage control.
episodes.title: The Stamp Tramp

episodes.synopsis: Marshall takes on Brad in the biggest case of his career. Meanwhile, the gang reminisces about their own run-ins with the law.
episodes.title: Twelve Horny Women

episodes.synopsis: Robin is determined to get Barney back, no matter what it takes. Meanwhile, Ted fills in as Marvin's nanny.
episodes.title: Lobster Crawl

episodes.synopsis: Robin becomes increasingly suspicious of Barney's relationship with Patrice, and Marshall discovers his mother is moving on in her romantic life.
episodes.title: The Over-Correction

episodes.synopsis: With Christmas fast approaching, Barney tells Ted that he plans on proposing to Patrice, which leads Ted to debate whether to tell Robin. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: The Final Page (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: With Christmas fast approaching, Barney tells Ted that he plans on proposing to Patrice, which leads Ted to debate whether to tell Robin. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: The Final Page (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: When Robin learns that Barney never asked her father's permission before proposing, she insists that he seek his approval.
episodes.title: Band or DJ?

episodes.synopsis: Barney begs Ted to continue seeing his much younger, much wilder girlfriend, even though Ted has nothing in common with her.
episodes.title: Ring Up!

episodes.synopsis: Barney uncovers the lost episode of Robin's "Underneath the Tunes" as Robin Sparkles. Marshall and Lily worry that Ted's new girlfriend is a stalker.
episodes.title: P.S. I Love You

episodes.synopsis: Ted is reluctant to break up with his crazy girlfriend Jeanette. Meanwhile, Robin becomes attached to Marvin after holding him for the first time.
episodes.title: Bad Crazy

episodes.synopsis: When Ted receives an unexpected call from the Captain, the gang reminisces about their last awkward encounter with him.
episodes.title: The Ashtray

episodes.synopsis: When Ted and Jeanette break up, Barney tries to help him land a new girl by using the infamous playbook Robin thought he had destroyed.
episodes.title: Weekend at Barney's

episodes.synopsis: When Robin asks Barney to sell his bachelor pad so they can build a home together, Barney is reluctant and drives away potential buyers.
episodes.title: The Fortress

episodes.synopsis: Future versions of Ted and Barney try to convince Ted to go see Robots Versus Wrestlers. Meanwhile, Marshall challenges Robin to a dance-off.
episodes.title: The Time Travelers

episodes.synopsis: When the Captain asks Lily to move to Rome for a year to be his art consultant, she fears that Marshall will resent her.
episodes.title: Romeward Bound

episodes.synopsis: The gang works together to plan a legendary bachelor party for Barney.
episodes.title: The Bro Mitzvah

episodes.synopsis: Robin is desperate to find her "something old" she buried in Central Park years earlier for the wedding.
episodes.title: Something Old

episodes.synopsis: Ted takes Lily to see the house he's been fixing up. Robin and Barney settle in for a treasured night of relaxation, only to be rudely interrupted.
episodes.title: Something New

episodes.synopsis: On the way to Long Island for their wedding weekend, Robin and Barney come across a startling family discovery.
episodes.title: The Locket

episodes.synopsis: Marshall sees something online that changes the course of his journey east, while Lily confronts Ted about letting go of Robin.
episodes.title: Coming Back

episodes.synopsis: Lily is frustrated that she is the only person who knows about Ted's list of things he wants to do in New York before he moves to Chicago.
episodes.title: Last Time in New York

episodes.synopsis: While Barney works through his anger after finding out Ted still has feelings for Robin, Marshall tries to help settle their dispute.
episodes.title: The Broken Code

episodes.synopsis: When Barney is forced to pick sides in a fight between Robin and his mother, Lily coaches him on how not to ruin his relationship.
episodes.title: The Poker Game

episodes.synopsis: When Ted finds himself with three prospects to be his date for the wedding, he chooses poorly. Marshall learns more about his driving companion.
episodes.title: Knight Vision

episodes.synopsis: When Daphne sends a troubling text message to Lily, Marshall enlists the gang's help to remove the text while enforcing the "no questions asked" rule.
episodes.title: No Questions Asked

episodes.synopsis: When Robin and Loretta's conflict escalates, Barney is caught in the middle. Meanwhile, Ted and Cassie try to enjoy a trip to a lighthouse.
episodes.title: The Lighthouse

episodes.synopsis: The gang ponders the future of the Ted, Robin and Barney love triangle. Meanwhile, Barney accepts a series of challenges from Lily and Robin.
episodes.title: Platonish

episodes.synopsis: When Barney's father arrives at the hotel, Barney devises a plan that makes Robin nervous. Ted is blamed for messing up a wedding-related duty.
episodes.title: Mom and Dad

episodes.synopsis: To get his restless son to go to sleep, Marshall tells him three tales in rhyme.
episodes.title: Bedtime Stories

episodes.synopsis: Barney becomes fixated on having his rehearsal dinner at a laser tag arena, much to Robin's dismay. Meanwhile, Ted doesn't come through on a promise.
episodes.title: The Rehearsal Dinner

episodes.synopsis: The gang encounters a guy at the wedding who intentionally stirs up trouble among them, and Marshall finally arrives at the Farhampton Inn.
episodes.title: Bass Player Wanted

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to deliver a devastating final slap to Barney, Marshall explains how he mastered the "Slap of a Million Exploding Suns."
episodes.title: Slapsgiving 3: Slappointment in Slapmarra

episodes.synopsis: When Barney drinks too much, Ted and Robin take advantage of him and get him to reveal secrets he's been hiding for years.
episodes.title: Unpause

episodes.synopsis: The Mother recounts how she met Ted and what she's been up to for the past eight years.
episodes.title: How Your Mother Met Me

episodes.synopsis: While out looking for an inebriated Barney on the day of the wedding, Robin and Ted reminisce about past relationships.
episodes.title: Sunrise

episodes.synopsis: When Barney suffers from a killer hangover the morning of his wedding, the gang tries to figure out the far-fetched ingredients in a proven antidote.
episodes.title: Rally

episodes.synopsis: On the morning of the wedding, Lily and Robin have a fight and Barney freaks out about which suit to wear.
episodes.title: Vesuvius

episodes.synopsis: Marshall enlists Ted and Barney to help him figure out where Lily went when she left in the middle of their fight.
episodes.title: Daisy

episodes.synopsis: When Gary Blauman shows up at the wedding, it sends the gang into a frenzy as they each recall an encounter with him.
episodes.title: Gary Blauman

episodes.synopsis: With only a half hour to go, Barney and Robin have panic attacks about their upcoming nuptials. Marshall and Lily rewrite their old wedding vows.
episodes.title: The End of the Aisle

episodes.synopsis: Ted finally finishes telling his kids the story of how he met their mother.
episodes.title: Last Forever: Part One

episodes.synopsis: Ted finally finishes telling his kids the story of how he met their mother. Barney experiences a life-changing event.
episodes.title: Last Forever: Part Two
